Class DatabaseHelper3

java.lang.Object
databasePart1.DatabaseHelper3
public class DatabaseHelper3 extends Object
DatabaseHelper3 class provides database operations for the review system. This class handles review creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion, as well as reviewer request management.

Copyright: Team 60 CSE 360

Since:
2025-04-01
Version:
1.0
Author:
Team60

  • Method Details

    • connectToDatabase

      public void connectToDatabase() throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • createTables

      private void createTables() throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • addReview

      public void addReview(Review review) throws SQLException
      Adds a new review to the database. The method inserts a review record with the provided reviewer, content, timestamp, question ID, and optional answer ID.
      Parameters:
      review - The review object to be added to the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getReviewsForQuestion

      public List<Review> getReviewsForQuestion(int questionId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves all reviews for a specific question from the database. This method queries the reviews table for all records where the question_id matches the provided questionId and the answer_id is NULL (indicating the review is for a question, not an answer).
      Parameters:
      questionId - The ID of the question to retrieve reviews for
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getReviewsForAnswer

      public List<Review> getReviewsForAnswer(int answerId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves all reviews for a specific answer from the database. This method queries the reviews table for all records where the answer_id matches the provided answerId.
      Parameters:
      answerId - The ID of the answer to retrieve reviews for
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateReview

      public void updateReview(Review review) throws SQLException
      Updates an existing review in the database. This method updates the content and timestamp of a review record in the reviews table.
      Parameters:
      review - The review object containing the updated content and timestamp
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • deleteReview

      public void deleteReview(int reviewId) throws SQLException
      Deletes a review from the database. This method deletes a review record from the reviews table based on the provided reviewId.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - The ID of the review to be deleted
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getReviewById

      public Review getReviewById(int reviewId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a review by its ID from the database. This method queries the reviews table for a record where the review_id matches the provided reviewId. It then constructs a Review object with the retrieved data.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - The ID of the review to retrieve
      Returns:
      The review object, or null if the review is not found
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • submitReviewerRequest

      public void submitReviewerRequest(String studentUsername) throws SQLException
      Submits a request for a student to become a reviewer in the database. This method inserts a new record into the reviewer_requests table with the provided studentUsername.
      Parameters:
      studentUsername - The username of the student requesting to become a reviewer
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getPendingReviewerRequests

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getPendingReviewerRequests() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all pending reviewer requests from the database. This method queries the reviewer_requests table for all records where the status is 'pending' and orders them by the request_date in descending order.
      Returns:
      A list of maps containing the request details
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • updateReviewerRequestStatus

      public void updateReviewerRequestStatus(int requestId, String status, String reviewerUsername, String notes) throws SQLException
      Updates the status of a reviewer request in the database. This method updates the status of a reviewer request record in the reviewer_requests table.
      Parameters:
      requestId - The ID of the request to update
      status - The new status for the request
      reviewerUsername - The username of the reviewer
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • hasPendingReviewerRequest

      public boolean hasPendingReviewerRequest(String studentUsername) throws SQLException
      Checks if a student has a pending reviewer request in the database. This method queries the reviewer_requests table for a record where the student_username matches the provided studentUsername and the status is 'pending'.
      Parameters:
      studentUsername - The username of the student to check for a pending request
      Returns:
      true if the student has a pending request, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getReviewerRequestStatus

      public Map<String,Object> getReviewerRequestStatus(String studentUsername) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the status of a student's reviewer request from the database. This method queries the reviewer_requests table for a record where the student_username matches the provided studentUsername and orders the results by the request_date in descending order.
      Parameters:
      studentUsername - The username of the student to retrieve the request status for
      Returns:
      A map containing the request status details
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • reportContent

      public void reportContent(String reporterUsername, String contentType, int contentId, String reason) throws SQLException
      Reports inappropriate content in the system. This method inserts a new record into the reported_content table with details about the reported content including the reporter, content type, content ID, and reason.
      Parameters:
      reporterUsername - The username of the staff member reporting the content
      contentType - The type of content being reported ("question" or "answer")
      contentId - The ID of the question or answer being reported
      reason - The reason for reporting the content
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getPendingReportedContent

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getPendingReportedContent() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all pending reported content. This method queries the reported_content table for all records where status is 'pending' and orders them by timestamp in descending order.
      Returns:
      A list of maps containing the report details
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • updateReportStatus

      public void updateReportStatus(int reportId, String status, String reviewerUsername, String reviewNotes) throws SQLException
      Updates the status of a reported content item. This method updates the status, reviewer, review notes, and review date of a reported content record in the reported_content table.
      Parameters:
      reportId - The ID of the report to update
      status - The new status for the report ("reviewed" or "dismissed")
      reviewerUsername - The username of the instructor who reviewed the report
      reviewNotes - Notes about the review decision
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getAllReportedContent

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getAllReportedContent() throws SQLException
      Gets all reported content items from the database, including both pending and reviewed items. This method retrieves all reported content records from the reported_content table and orders them by timestamp in descending order.
      Returns:
      A list of maps containing the report details
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • banStudent

      public void banStudent(String studentUsername, String bannedBy, String reason) throws SQLException
      Bans a student in the system
      Parameters:
      studentUsername - The username of the student to ban
      bannedBy - The username of the staff/instructor who issued the ban
      reason - The reason for the ban
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • unbanStudent

      public void unbanStudent(String studentUsername) throws SQLException
      Unbans a student in the system
      Parameters:
      studentUsername - The username of the student to unban
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • isStudentBanned

      public boolean isStudentBanned(String studentUsername) throws SQLException
      Checks if a student is banned
      Parameters:
      studentUsername - The username of the student to check
      Returns:
      true if the student is banned, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getBannedStudents

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getBannedStudents() throws SQLException
      Gets a list of all banned students
      Returns:
      List of banned student usernames
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • updateReviewerScorecard

      public void updateReviewerScorecard(String reviewerUsername, int friendliness, int accuracy, int judgement, int communication) throws SQLException
      Updates or inserts a reviewer's scorecard parameters
      Parameters:
      reviewerUsername - The username of the reviewer
      friendliness - Score from 0-5
      accuracy - Score from 0-5
      judgement - Score from 0-5
      communication - Score from 0-5
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getReviewerScorecard

      public Map<String,Object> getReviewerScorecard(String reviewerUsername) throws SQLException
      Gets a reviewer's scorecard
      Parameters:
      reviewerUsername - The username of the reviewer
      Returns:
      Map containing the scorecard data or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getAllReviewerScorecards

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getAllReviewerScorecards() throws SQLException
      Gets all reviewer scorecards
      Returns:
      List of maps containing all reviewer scorecards
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • updateReviewerProfile

      public void updateReviewerProfile(String username, String about, String experience, String specialties) throws SQLException
      Updates a reviewer's profile information
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the reviewer
      about - Information about the reviewer
      experience - The reviewer's experience
      specialties - The reviewer's specialties
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getReviewerProfile

      public Map<String,Object> getReviewerProfile(String username) throws SQLException
      Gets a reviewer's profile information
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the reviewer
      Returns:
      Map containing the reviewer's profile information or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • addReviewerFeedback

      public void addReviewerFeedback(String reviewerUsername, String studentUsername, String content, int rating) throws SQLException
      Adds feedback for a reviewer
      Parameters:
      reviewerUsername - The username of the reviewer
      studentUsername - The username of the student providing feedback
      content - The feedback content
      rating - The rating (1-5)
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getReviewerFeedback

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getReviewerFeedback(String reviewerUsername) throws SQLException
      Gets all feedback for a reviewer
      Parameters:
      reviewerUsername - The username of the reviewer
      Returns:
      List of maps containing the feedback
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getReviewsByReviewer

      public List<Review> getReviewsByReviewer(String reviewerUsername) throws SQLException
      Gets all reviews by a specific reviewer
      Parameters:
      reviewerUsername - The username of the reviewer
      Returns:
      List of Review objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
